Everyone should be able to count on affordable homes and a stable climate – and that is achievable.

Read @Canada2020 Advisory Board Chair @MarkJCarney's op-ed in today's @GlobeandMail: https://t.co/6A4fgqbXTe https://t.co/SOQQmqZg9X

profile_bio.description: Canada's leading, independent, progressive think-tank. Events, research and big ideas about public policy. Follow @2020Network for our podcasts.

tweets.text:
Climate change and housing affordability aren’t just solvable problems; they have common solutions. Politicians at every level of government should take note and take action.

My op-ed in today’s @GlobeandMail:

https://t.co/2Egoo4gZJJ

profile_bio.description: Prime Minister of Canada and Leader of the Liberal Party | Premier ministre du Canada et chef du Parti libéral

value.string_value: If our effort to build millions of additional housing units ignores the climate consequences, we won’t truly achieve affordability
Opinion: We all deserve affordable homes and a stable climate – and that is achievable
